Module.Content:
<style type="text/css">
                html
		{
                    width: __UP_rdW__px;
                    height: __UP_rdH__px;
                }
		body, app-root
		{
		    background: transparent;
		    width: __UP_rdW__px;
		    height: __UP_rdH__px;
		    overflow: hidden;
		}
            </style>
            
            <body>
            <app-root></app-root>
	      	<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/demo/dist/ng-gadget-demo/runtime-es2015.js" type="module"></script>
		<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/demo/dist/ng-gadget-demo/runtime-es5.js" nomodule defer></script>
		<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/demo/dist/ng-gadget-demo/polyfills-es5.js" nomodule defer></script>
		<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/demo/dist/ng-gadget-demo/polyfills-es2015.js" type="module"></script>
		<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/demo/dist/ng-gadget-demo/styles-es2015.js" type="module"></script>
		<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/demo/dist/ng-gadget-demo/styles-es5.js" nomodule defer></script>
		<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/demo/dist/ng-gadget-demo/vendor-es2015.js" type="module"></script>
		<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/demo/dist/ng-gadget-demo/vendor-es5.js" nomodule defer></script>
		<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/demo/dist/ng-gadget-demo/main-es2015.js" type="module"></script>
		<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/demo/dist/ng-gadget-demo/main-es5.js" nomodule defer></script></body>
            </body>
